import { useReducer } from 'react' import { todoReducer } from './todoReducer' const initialState = [ { id : new Date().getTime(), description: 'Recolectar la piedar del alma', done: false, }, { id : new Date().getTime() *3, description: 'Recolectar la piedar del alma', done: false, } ] export const TodoApp = () => { //si solo hay un reducer se pude dejar solo dispatch, si tengo mas de uno le coloco un nombre representartivo todoDispacth const [todos, dispatch] = useReducer( todoReducer, initialState) return ( <>
